result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.

records.addlTxt: Waiver of Prelim on November 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:14 AM Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Stephen M Compton did not appear.  Attorney Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Matter continued for Attorney to be present.
Waiver of Preliminary Hearing scheduled for November 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.

3:43 PM Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen M Compton appeared by video for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Preliminary Hearing requested in person, time limits waived.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.

3:34 PM Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Taylor Klokow appeared by video on behalf of Attorney Stephen M Compton for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.  Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Matter continued for attorney to speak to Defendant.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

3:11 pm Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Taylor E Klokow appeared by video for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.  Prosecuting attorney David Zarwell appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Court grants Defendant's request for continuance. Adjourned initial appearance set for September 23, 2022 at 3:00 pm
Adjourned initial appearance on September 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

3:10 PM Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen M Compton appeared by phone for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.  Prosecuting attorney Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 25, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

3:45 PM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephen M Compton appeared by video for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

9:18 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander David Goulart in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video.  Court appoints Attorney Compton. Adjourned Initial appearance August 17, 2022 at 1:00PM
Adjourned initial appearance on August 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on August 10, 2022 at 09:00 am.

8:15 AM Prosecuting attorney Emmeline Lee in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Status conference on August 2, 2022 at 08:15 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr.
Current: 1621 Fayette Ave, Beloit, WI 53511 United States  (Effective: 07-08-2022)
Prior: 1620 Fayette Avenue, Beloit, WI 53511

03:38 PM Prosecuting attorney Cheniqua White appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. appeared by video, in custody from the Rock County Jail.  Attorney Ryan W O'Hara appeared by video for Shawndell Lamont Summerville Sr. Warrant vacated. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived. Address verified. Conflict for Public Defenders office. Court orders $500 Cash Bond with conditions: Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. Maintain absolute sobriety. Matter to be set for appointment of Attorney.
Not to consume or possess a controlled substance without a valid prescription and in prescribed amounts only. Absolute sobriety.
